name: residuary
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
relating to the part of a dead person's money and property that is left after taxes and debts have been paid, and bequests (= gifts)have been made: Her will left her residuary estate to her daughter. A residuary beneficiary is the person to whom the balance of an estate is given after all other bequests are distributed. Related word
residue
More examplesFewer examplesThe money should be distributed to the beneficiaries named in the residuary clause of his will.The will appoints Mr Smith her executor, and you the residuary legatee.
